post:
Been trying to get this license sold for a few days now, thought it would get more interest in the other places I listed it, but figured I'd throw it out here as well.

I'd like to get $150 for it (all funds are going towards a non-profit formation, nothing is going in my pocket), but will accept $125 if I must.

With this purchase ($300 value if purchased direct from Blesta) you will receive a v3 owned unbranded license as well as a v2 owned unbranded license.

The support for these licenses is expired, yearly renewal is $39
